Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: not centralized, the notaries are elected yearly and are different people. They don't have any power on the consensus of protected chains. It's not dPoS. Every notarization turn is done by a random pick of 13 notaries that must all agree on the same data. Also all normal nodes like you and me, check that the notarized data is correct. Incorrect notarizations would be ignored.
